document.full_text: jpmorgan chase & co urged a bankruptcy court on tuesday to throw out lehman brothers holdings' claim demanding that it hand over $8.6 billion in cash taken as collateral in the weeks before lehman imploded in september 2008.
document.title: jpmorgan denies gouging lehman in $8.6 billion fight
lines_and_colors: jpmorgan chase & co urged a bankruptcy court on tuesday to throw out lehman brothers holdings' claim demanding that it hand over $8.6 billion in cash taken as collateral in the weeks before lehman imploded in september 2008.
